programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Alison and Mondo are amateur flippers who have not only taken on the worst house on the block, but the worst house Tarek has ever seen.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: A couple is tired of mediocre profits and asks Tarek to help with their next flip in Anaheim, CA. Even with his guidance, they struggle to make the right decisions and face an uphill battle when the local market starts to buck.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: A couple that flipped a home with Tarek in the past must call on him again after buying a home with stalactites on the ceilings and competition nearby. When Tarek learns they didn't call the city about permits, he doubts whether the project can be saved.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Patricia and Legacy are professional dancers turned house flippers and a high-end project in Brentwood has them seeing dollar signs. Their hideously expensive loan and a major foundation problem threaten to ruin this flip from the start.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Lidia and Fernando are putting all their savings on the line to flip their first home in Rancho Cucamonga. She's a dreamer obsessed with expensive design. He is so neurotic about losing money, he's trying to skimp everywhere he can.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Tarek mentors real estate novices to help them learn the secrets of a successful flip.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.desc: See Mike Holmes and the next generation as they help a recently widowed woman complete unfinished projects in her home. Assisting many others, her husband was known as the neighborhood's Good Samaritan, and now the Holmes crew returns the favor.

programme.title: Holmes and Holmes

programme.desc: See Mike Holmes and the next generation take on a family's heritage home with numerous issues. A contractor guaranteed the house had been updated, but three years later, they're still encountering problems and need to make the place safe again.

programme.title: Holmes and Holmes
programme.desc: See Mike Holmes and the next generation help a single homeowner who's struggling with an older house. She's too proud to ask for help, so Mike and the family step in to assist with maintenance issues and improve her curb appeal.

programme.desc: New Jersey residents head to Amelia Island, Florida, in search of their dream vacation home. She's looking for a house with a beachy vibe that's close to the ocean. He's wanting something farther inland that's more traditional.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a true Swedish Unicorn of the car world: a '95 Volvo 850 T-5R, a station wagon with a racing pedigree. Unfortunately, the Turbo in the T-5R is in need of TLC, and some creative thinking from the guys is needed to solve the bodywork issues.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike gets his hands on the Japanese Ferrari, also known as a 1991 Toyota MR2 Turbo. One small fix becomes a big problem for Ant as the entire engine has to be removed but at least it gives him the chance to deal with even more problems along the way.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a 2002 Chevrolet Corvette Z06 with over 400 hp and zero to sixty in under four seconds. It's a road-legal race car, but Ant is less than enthused when he realizes the scale of the work needed to help it regain those impressive numbers.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike tracks down a rare '91 Alfa Romeo 164L. He loves the look of this car but Ant has his work cut out for him. This Alpha has perfect bodywork, but it has a leaking engine, faulty steering, dodgy brakes, and a host of other issues.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks
programme.desc: Martha flips a pre-war era gem. Ash gets tangled up in a custom truck with a few unpleasant revelations waiting under the bed. Tommy parties like a rock star all in the name of business and JD sweats it out resurrecting a '66 Mustang.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: Unpolished

programme.title: Half-Ton Killer?
programme.desc: Topping 1,000 lbs., Mayra Rosales is accused of murdering her nephew. During the three-year trial, a nationwide debate erupted over whether or not an obese person can get away with murder.

programme.title: Half-Ton Killer: Transformed
programme.desc: Mayra Rosales was one of the heaviest women in the world, embattled in one of the most publicized murder trials in history. Since her acquittal, she has begun a long journey: countless surgeries and hours of physical therapy for her second chance at life.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Ashley is 24 and lives alone. Her only sources of comfort are food and the relationships she has online. But not a single one of her profiles is real. Soon, Ashley learns that Dr. Now isn't someone she can lie to like her online friends.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Holly already has one failed weight loss surgery, so to succeed this time, she must do more than change her eating habits, she must address the childhood issues that continue to plague her.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Gina and wife Beth live with Gina's mom but don't have her support. She and Gina's sister blame Beth for Gina's spiraling weight problem. Now it will take all Gina's will to leave home for Houston to get Dr. Now's help to save her life and her marriage.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: At nearly 1,000 pounds, Samantha is dangerously close to dying. To make matters worse, she's paid to eat by making videos online. If Samantha doesn't overcome her toxic relationship with food, she worries that she will leave her daughter motherless.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Thederick has become housebound from eating, and for 10 years, he's only gone outside to greet the ice cream man. After a recent hospital scare, it's finally clicked that if Dr. Now's program doesn't work for him, then nothing will.

programme.desc: Dr. Lee is tasked with helping Reginald remove a large growth on his head. Then, Che'RE has a prominent bump on her place and Juan has boils on the back of his neck.

programme.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life
programme.desc: Whitney visits Buddy in D.C. where they share a surprise kiss. Heather struggles to get over Buddy. Whitney is confronted with her parents' aging. An adoption agent gives Whitney painful news.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Super fan TK brings seven of her closest friends to help her choose her dress. Actress Leslie has an unlimited budget, but she refuses to believe her opinionated mom chose the perfect wedding gown on the very first try.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Join Randy Fenoli as he revisits some of the most memorable appointments from Say Yes to the Dress.

programme.title: Unpolished
programme.desc: Lexi finally spills what's been bothering her about Matt all of these years, and a divide forms in the family. Bria and Matt isolate themselves while Lexi throws herself into work with a 3-D nail build that challenges her skills.

programme.title: Unpolished
programme.desc: Lexi's creativity is pushed to the limit for her latest client's nails, but problems with technology threaten to make her experiment a failure. Bria and Matt arrive in Las Vegas to elope and the rest of the family slowly catches wind of their plan.

programme.title: 40 Year Old Child: A New Case
programme.desc: Gabby is eight-years-old but still looks like a baby, now, new cases have emerged that may help unlock the mystery of her aging.

programme.title: Bubble Skin Man
programme.desc: Chandra is afflicted by a terrible and unknown condition that has left his body riddled with hundreds of tumours. Now with signs of the condition appearing in his two oldest children, Chandra is racing against time to find a cure.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Property investors get more than they bargained for when the house they purchased is occupied by hoarder Michelle and a rat infestation so bad, it has compromised the building's foundation.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive

programme.title: Tallest Teens

programme.title: Extraordinary People
programme.desc: Meet Jyoti Amge, the smallest woman in the world. At 24 inches tall and a mere 12 pounds, Jyoti is in the U.S. for work and to explore American culture. She also hopes to find a doctor for a serious health issue her two broken legs.
